globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
A dingy facility lies in disrepair on the top of a hill. A squad of stormtroopers patrol the perimeter, weapons readied.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
Your comlink crackles with an unfamiliar voice: “Tagg Ronin here; that was my ship that got shot down. I was able to slip past the outer patrol, but I'll need some more firepower to finish the job. See what you can do about getting past those guards and then we can get in, grab what we need, and get out before they even know what hit them.”

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes find the caches.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.
Find the caches.

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes find the caches.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You run out the back door of the facility to find a new tramp freighter, this time with heavier defenses, waiting for you to load in the cargo. The crew shouts at you to hurry as you sprint toward the ship. Imperial blaster bolts whiz past you as you escape,

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Alliance Smuggler as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Blaster fire impacts all around you as you and Tagg are overrun. You're forced to abandon the mission and even the supplies you've already claimed. When you arrive at your transport, you must explain to the crew why they will only be carrying passengers and not cargo.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Allegiance
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into an old and rundown hallway.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A weathered door protects the family from the arid heat.

eventActions.theText: A rugged man in a utility vest aims a blaster at you, but lowers it as soon as he realizes you're with the Alliance. "Glad you could come", Tagg says. "Ready for a teamup?"
{-} Apply +*1* Health to Tagg Ronin.

globalEvents.name: Surrounded
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the door lies a small workshop.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText: A rusty door leads deeper into the facility.

eventActions.theText: Guards are already waiting for you. At the same time, you hear snarls from outside as Trandoshan bounty hunters approach, weapons drawn.
One of the missing caches is sitting in a corner of the room.

entityProperties.name: Cache 1
entityProperties.theText:
A cache full of weapons and supplies is placed in the corner of the room.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a cache ({K}) to try and retrieve it. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to that cache, apply -1 {B} to the test results.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a cache ({K}) to try and retrieve it. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to that cache, apply -1 {B} to the test results.
{-} The mission will progress when all caches have been retrieved.
Be adjacent to the closest cache with the least Imperial figures adjacent to it.
Retrieve all caches (&Caches&/4).

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent caches.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a cache ({K}) to try and retrieve it. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to that cache, apply -1 {B} to the test results.
{-} The mission will progress when all caches have been retrieved.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Well-Protected
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into an old and decrepit factory.

entityProperties.name: Door 3
entityProperties.theText: A rusty door leads deeper into the facility.

eventActions.theText: One of the caches is sitting next to the wall.

entityProperties.name: Cache 2
entityProperties.theText:
A cache full of weapons and supplies is placed next to the wall.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a cache ({K}) to try and retrieve it. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to that cache, apply -1 {B} to the test results.

eventActions.theText: More guards are drawing their weapons as you enter.

globalEvents.name: Final Force
globalEvents.eventText: Hot air rushes in as you open the door. At the end of a long hallway, the facility opens to the outside.

entityProperties.name: Door 4
entityProperties.theText: The door is weathered and worn. The outside can't be far.

eventActions.theText: The remaining caches are stored on shelves.

entityProperties.name: Cache 3
entityProperties.theText:
A cache full of weapons and supplies is stored on the shelf.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a cache ({K}) to try and retrieve it. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to that cache, apply -1 {B} to the test results.

eventActions.theText: The hallway is guarded by various enemies.
Outside, a tramp freighter is hovering, waiting to pick you up.

entityProperties.name: Extraction Point
entityProperties.theText:
A tramp freighter is waiting here, engines running.

{-} When all of the caches have been retrieved and all heroes are on or adjacent to the extraction point, click "Heroes Depart".

globalEvents.name: All Caches Retrieved
globalEvents.eventText:
"Now let's get outta here!", Tagg shouts, pointing at the freighter.
